Reference

Compensation

Functions to compute, edit and visualise compensation

spillover_compute()

Compute Spillover Matrix

spillover_edit()

Edit Spillover Matrix

cyto_plot_compensation()

Plot Compensation in All Fluorescent Channels

Spillover Spreading

Functions to compute and visualise spillover spreading matrices

spillover_spread_compute()

Compute Spillover Spreading Matrix

Annotation

Functions to annotate flow cytometry data

cyto_markers()

Assign marker names to flowFrame or flowSet

cyto_annotate()

Interactively edit pData Information for a flowSet or GatingSet

Helpers

Functions to simplify regular operations

cyto_fluor_channels()

Extract Fluorescent Channels

cyto_channel_check()

Check Supplied Channels

cyto_channel_select()

Select Fluorescent Channel for Compensation Controls

cyto_trans_check()

Check Transformation List Object

cyto_sample()

Sample a flowFrame

gate_type()

Get Gate Type from Saved Gate.

Gating

Functions to draw, construct, edit or remove gates

gate_rectangle_draw()

Draw Rectangle Gate(s) Around Populations.

gate_polygon_draw()

Draw Polygon Gate(s) Around Populations.

gate_ellipse_draw()

Draw Ellipsoid Gate(s) Around Populations.

gate_interval_draw()

Draw Interval Gate(s) Around Populations.

gate_threshold_draw()

Draw Threshold Gate(s) Around Populations.

gate_boundary_draw()

Draw Boundary Gate(s) Around Populations.

gate_quadrant_draw()

Draw Quadrant Gates Around Populations.

gate_web_draw()

Draw Web Gates Around Populations.

gate_draw()

gate_draw

gate_edit()

Edit Existing Gate(s).

gate_remove()

Remove Gate(s) and Edit gatingTemplate csv File

Modification of gatingTemplate

Functions to modify the gatingTemplate

gatingTemplate_edit()

Interactively Edit a gatingTemplate

Visualisation

Functions to visualise flow cytometry data

cyto_plot()

cyto_plot

cyto_plot_profile()

Plot Expression Profile in All Fluorescent Channels

cyto_plot_gating_scheme()

Plot Flow Cytometry Gating Strategies

cyto_plot_gate()

Plot Gate Objects onto an Existing Plot

cyto_plot_label()

Add boxed text labels to cyto_plot

cyto_plot_contour()

Contour Lines for cyto_plot

cyto_plot_overlay()

Overlay Points on cyto_plot

Statistics

Functions to compute and export statistics

cyto_stats_compute()

Compute Statistics

Conversion of gatingTemplate

Function to convert old gatingTemplates to new format

gatingTemplate_convert()

Convert Old gatingTemplates to New Format
